alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 2:36PM MST until December 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Worley, Sandpoint, Rockford, Oakesdale, Davenport, Potlatch, Post Falls, Eastport, Hayden, Priest River, Coeur d`Alene, Colfax, Tekoa, Schweitzer Mountain Road, La Crosse, Moscow, Fairfield, Pullman, Downtown Spokane, Plummer, Bonners Ferry, Genesee, Cheney, Spokane Valley, Athol, Uniontown, Rosalia, and Airway Heights. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.

area.areaDesc: Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle
